LOCALIZATION.DATE.DATETIME_FORMAT_HINT: common formats (z.B. 31.12.2019 12:00), short notation (z.B. 31122019), short notation for current year (z.B. 3112), relative entries  (z.B. 0 for current date and time, +1 for tomorrow, +1h for today in an hour, +1w, -1d, -1y, -1s  etc.)
LOCALIZATION.DATE.TIME_FORMAT_HINT: common time format (e.g. `14:00`), short notation (e.g. `1400`), relative time (e.g. `+1` for one hour from now, `+15m` , `-30s`, `-1h`, etc.)

PAGE.ATTRIBUTE_EDITOR.OPEN_DATATYPE_HINT: Open editor for the currently selected data type
PAGE.ATTRIBUTE_EDITOR.COMPOUND_COMPONENT:
For proper use of values of the compound attribute (e.g. for filtering or saving data), make sure that each component has prefixes and/or suffixes, that never appear inside the components values.

For example, if you have an order position id attribute, that consists of the order number and the position index, giving the position index the prefix "--" would produce compound values like 123--1, 123--2, etc. These can be split back into their components because a double minus is very unlikely to be part of the order number the position index.

WIDGET.BUTTON.ERROR_DATA_TO_LARGE_DESCRI:
For security reasons the maximum size of a data sent to your web server is limited.

Try to send the data in parts: e.g. if you are uploading files, upload them separately. Bear in mind, that data and files are enncoded for transmission, which increases their size!
